content.plan:
1. Navigate to https://www.wrangler.in/ and verify homepage visual signals.
2. Wait for the homepage to fully load and confirm visual signals: MEN, WOMEN, NEW ARRIVALS, DENIM.
3. Close any promotional popup or banner if present and verify the close control is available.
4. Click the search icon or focus the search input and verify the search UI appears.
5. Type "solid blue shirt" into the search field and submit the query, then verify the results page shows product listings.
6. Ensure the search results contain at least one product titled "Solid Blue Shirt" and that price and Add to Cart options are displayed.
7. Click on the first matching Solid Blue Shirt product and verify the product detail page loads with size options.
8. Verify that size options include "XL" and that the XL size is available.
9. Select size "XL" and confirm the selection is reflected.
10. Click the "Add to Cart" button and verify a success indication (e.g., "Added", "Success", "Cart").
11. Navigate to the cart page and verify the cart displays the Solid Blue Shirt with size "XL" and quantity 1.
